text: Iti (Muhammad (SAW)): “Imi varanda vangu vanotenda (muhumwechete hwaAllah), ivai munotya Tenzi venyu. Runako (Mubairo) nderwe avo vanoita mabasa akanaka panyika pano, uye nyika yaAllah yakakura (kuti kana musingakwanisi kuvanamata pane imwe nzvimbo munovanamata kumwe). Zvirokwazvo, avo vanotsungirira vachawana mubairo wavo wakazara pasina kutongwa (kuverengerwa).”
